item.title: Mobile(s) with Fedora Core 5
item.description: Easy Teq.: Connecting your Nokia 2112 with your Fedora Core 5 - a guide for connecting (a) Nokia phone with Fedora Core 5. But what is wanted to know is how to connect my N-Gage with FC5 >=l
